ultimate.name: Dauntless Hymn
ultimate.description: Mikola generates a 2-tile Courage Sphere that follows her around, increasing Haste by 40 and Ranged DEF by 10 for all allies within range, while increasing her own Haste by 30 and Ranged DEF by 10. When Mikola deals total damage equal to 300% of her initial ATK while Courage Sphere is around, a Healing Wave will emerge, restoring 80% HP to all allies within range. Courage Sphere lasts for 10s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the healing amount of Healing Wave to 90%.
Increases the duration of Courage Sphere to 12s.
Increases the healing amount of Healing Wave to 100%.
Increases the healing amount of Healing Wave to 110%.

skill_1.name: Heroic Duel
skill_1.description:
Mikola generates an Honor Arena spanning the battlefield when a battle starts, lasting until the battle ends. The side with more units within the arena will gain control of it after maintaining the advantage for 3s.

Mikola restores all allies' HP by 12% per second and increases their ATK by 14% when her side gains control of the Honor Arena.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases all allies' ATK by 16% when Mikolas side gains control of the Honor Arena.
Increases all allies' ATK by 18% when Mikolas side gains control of the Honor Arena.
Increases all allies' ATK by 20% when Mikolas side gains control of the Honor Arena.

skill_2.name: Vigorous Call
skill_2.description: Mikola rings her bell, restoring 130% HP and increasing Phys & Magic DEF by 40% for herself and the 2 weakest allies for 5s.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Mikola increases her ATK by 9% during battle. She gains an extra 6% ATK when her side gains control of the Honor Arena.

upgrades.upgrade: Mikola increases her ATK by 12% during battle. She gains an extra 8% ATK when her side gains control of the Honor Arena.
Mikola increases her ATK by 15% during battle. She gains an extra 10% ATK when her side gains control of the Honor Arena.

ex_skill.description: Mikola enhances her Courage Sphere after it has been active for 6s, granting Combat Fury to all allied heroes (except herself) within range, and dealing damage equal to 50% of her ATK per second to enemies adjacent to these allies. The enhancements reset when the Courage Sphere disappears.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases Mikolas damage dealt per second to enemies adjacent to allies carrying Combat Fury to 60% of her ATK.
Increases 30 Vitality for allies carrying Combat Fury.
Increases Mikolas damage dealt per second to enemies adjacent to allies carrying Combat Fury to 70% of her ATK.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Mikola's Courage Sphere remains unaffected in duration if her side gains control of the Honor Arena.
